title: Open sets of a metric space

blocks.name: mopnval
blocks.content: An open set is a subset of a metric space which includes a ball around each of its points. Definition 1.3-2 of [Kreyszig] p. 18. The object ` ( MetOpen `` D ) ` is the family of all open sets in the metric space determined by the metric ` D ` . By ~ mopntop , the open sets of a metric space form a topology ` J ` , whose base set is ` U. J ` by ~ mopnuni . (Contributed by NM, 1-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mopnval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cxmet))))
  sseli(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1), cuni(crn(cxmet)))
  fvssunirn(cxmet, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0))), cfv(cmopn, c0), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cxmet))))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cuni(crn(cxmet)), cmopn, cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0))), cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, cv(hs0)))))
  fveq2d(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, cv(hs0))), crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cfv(cbl, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbl)
  df-mopn(hs0)
  fvex(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(cxmet)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mopnval(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ c2 =(topGen ` ran((ball ` c0))))
  ⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c0)
} = {
  syl(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 =(topGen ` ran((ball ` c0))), c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(*Met))
  sseli(c0, (*Met ` c1), ⋃ ran(*Met))
  fvssunirn(cxmet, c1)
  syl5eq(c2, (topGen ` ran((ball ` c0))), (MetOpen ` c0), c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(*Met))
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, ⋃ ran(*Met), cmopn, (topGen ` ran((ball ` c0))), (topGen ` ran((ball ` hs0))))
  fveq2d(ctg, ran((ball ` hs0)), ran((ball ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((ball ` hs0), (ball ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbl)
  df-mopn(hs0)
  fvex(ctg, ran((ball ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ ran(*Met))
  diff.hs0.c((topGen ` ran((ball ` c0))))
}

blocks.name: mopntopon
blocks.content: The set of open sets of a metric space ` X ` is a topology on ` X ` . Remark in [Kreyszig] p. 19. This theorem connects the two concepts and makes available the theorems for topologies for use with metric spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: mopntop
blocks.content: The set of open sets of a metric space is a topology. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: mopnuni
blocks.content: The union of all open sets in a metric space is its underlying set. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: elmopn
blocks.content: The defining property of an open set of a metric space. (Contributed by NM, 1-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmopn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  3bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))), wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wa(wss(c2, cuni(crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2))))))
  eleq2d(c2, c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  mopnval(c0, c1, c3)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wa(wss(c2, cuni(crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))))), wcel(crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), ctb))
  blbas(c0, c1)
  eltg2(s0, s1, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), ctb, c2)
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, cuni(crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cv(s1), c2)))), wss(c2, c1))
  sseq2d(c2, cuni(crn(cfv(cbl, c0))), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  unirnbl(c0, c1)
  diff.crn.s(s0, cfv(cbl, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbl, c0)
  diff.cbl.s(s0)
  diff.ctb.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, cfv(cbl, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbl, c0)
  diff.cbl.s(s1)
  diff.ctb.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elmopn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→(c2 ∈ c3 ↔(c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))))))
  ⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→(c2 ∈ c3 ↔(c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→(c2 ∈ c3 ↔(c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))))), d(s1, c1))
  3bitrd(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, (c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))), c2 ∈(topGen ` ran((ball ` c0))), (c2 ⊆ ⋃ ran((ball ` c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2)))))
  eleq2d(c2, c3, (topGen ` ran((ball ` c0))), c0 ∈(*Met ` c1))
  mopnval(c0, c1, c3)
  syl(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (c2 ∈(topGen ` ran((ball ` c0)))↔(c2 ⊆ ⋃ ran((ball ` c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))))), ran((ball ` c0))∈ TopBases)
  blbas(c0, c1)
  eltg2(s0, s1, ran((ball ` c0)), ctb, c2)
  anbi1d(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ ⋃ ran((ball ` c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ s1 ∧ s1 ⊆ c2))), c2 ⊆ c1)
  sseq2d(c2, ⋃ ran((ball ` c0)), c1, c0 ∈(*Met ` c1))
  unirnbl(c0, c1)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (ball ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbl, c0)
  diff.cbl.s(s0)
  diff.ctb.s(s0)
  diff.crn.s(s1, (ball ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbl, c0)
  diff.cbl.s(s1)
  diff.ctb.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: mopnfss
blocks.content: The family of open sets of a metric space is a collection of subsets of the base set. (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: mopnm
blocks.content: The base set of a metric space is open. Part of Theorem T1 of [Kreyszig] p. 19. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: elmopn2
blocks.content: A defining property of an open set of a metric space. (Contributed by NM, 5-May-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)

thm elmopn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c2))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c2)))), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))))))
  elmopn(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c2, wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2)))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c2))))
  ralbidva(s0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  anassrs(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wb(wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c2))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wb(wrex(hs0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c2))), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c2))), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  ssel2(c2, c1, cv(s0))
  blssex(hs0, s1, c0, c1, cv(s0), c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cxmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cxmet, c1)
  diff.cxmet.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm elmopn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→(c2 ∈ c3 ↔(c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+,(s0[(ball ` c0)]s1)⊆ c2)))))
  ⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, (c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+,(s0[(ball ` c0)]s1)⊆ c2))), (c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2)))))
  elmopn(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  pm5.32da(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2))), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+,(s0[(ball ` c0)]s1)⊆ c2)))
  ralbidva(s0, c2, (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+,(s0[(ball ` c0)]s1)⊆ c2))
  anassrs(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈ c2, (∃(hs0 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+,(s0[(ball ` c0)]s1)⊆ c2)))
  sylan2(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), (∃(hs0 ∈ ran((ball ` c0)),(s0 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c2))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+,(s0[(ball ` c0)]s1)⊆ c2)), s0 ∈ c1)
  ssel2(c2, c1, s0)
  blssex(hs0, s1, c0, c1, s0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ⊆ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (*Met ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cxmet, c1)
  diff.cxmet.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: mopnss
blocks.content: An open set of a metric space is a subspace of its base set. (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: isxms
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` <. X , D >. ` is an extended metric space" with underlying set ` X ` and distance function ` D ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isxms(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxms), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c3, c3)))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cxms, ctps, wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2)), wceq(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))), c1, cfv(cmopn, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(ctopn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctopn)
  fveq2d(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), c2, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c3, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  reseq12d(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c3, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cds)
  sqxpeqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-xms(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctps)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isxms(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ *MetSp ↔(c0 ∈ TopSp ∧ c1 =(MetOpen ` c2)))
  ⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =((dist ` c0)|`(c3 × c3))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cxms, ctps, c1 =(MetOpen ` c2), (TopOpen ` hs0)=(MetOpen `((dist ` hs0)|`((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0)))))
  eqeq12d((TopOpen ` hs0), (MetOpen `((dist ` hs0)|`((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0)))), c1, (MetOpen ` c2), hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((TopOpen ` hs0), c1, (TopOpen ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ctopn)
  fveq2d(cmopn, ((dist ` hs0)|`((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0))), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(((dist ` hs0)|`((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0))), c2, ((dist ` c0)|`(c3 × c3)), hs0 = c0)
  reseq12d((dist ` hs0), ((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0)), (dist ` c0), (c3 × c3), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cds)
  sqxpeqd((Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c3, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-xms(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctps)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 =(MetOpen ` c2))
}

blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` <. X , D >. ` is an extended metric space" with underlying set ` X ` and distance function ` D ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isxms2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cxms), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cxms), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c1))))
  isxms(c0, c3, c1, c2)
  pm5.32ri(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
  syl5bb(wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c1)), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  istps(c0, c3, c2)
  impbid(wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(cxmet, c2)))

blocks.name: xmspropd
blocks.content: Property deduction for an extended metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xmspropd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))))), wa(wcel(c1, ctps), wceq(cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)))))))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))), wcel(c1, ctps), wceq(cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))))
  tpspropd(c0, c1, w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), c2, w0)
  eqeq12d(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))), cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)))), w0)
  fveq2d(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), w0)
  eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  isxms(c0, cfv(ctopn, c0), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  isxms(c1, cfv(ctopn, c1), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm xmspropd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ *MetSp ↔ c1 ∈ *MetSp))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2))=((dist ` c1)|`(c2 × c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ∈ *MetSp, c1 ∈ *MetSp, (c0 ∈ TopSp ∧(TopOpen ` c0)=(MetOpen `((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))))), (c1 ∈ TopSp ∧(TopOpen ` c1)=(MetOpen `((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1))))))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ∈ TopSp, (TopOpen ` c0)=(MetOpen `((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)))), c1 ∈ TopSp, (TopOpen ` c1)=(MetOpen `((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1)))))
  tpspropd(c0, c1, w0)
  eqtr3d((Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), c2, w0)
  eqeq12d((TopOpen ` c0), (MetOpen `((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)))), (TopOpen ` c1), (MetOpen `((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1)))), w0)
  fveq2d(cmopn, ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))), ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1))), w0)
  eqtr3d(((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))), ((dist ` c1)|`((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1))), ((dist ` c1)|`(c2 × c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(((dist ` c1)|`(c2 × c2)), ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))), ((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2)), w0)
  reseq2d((dist ` c0), (c2 × c2), ((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)), w0)

thm mspropd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c1, cms), wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c0)))), wa(wcel(c1, cxms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c1)))))

  xmspropd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eleq12d(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c0)), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
  eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  eqtr3d(cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c2, c2)), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2)), w0)
  reseq2d(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c2, c2), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)

  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c0))

  isms(c1, cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(ctopn, c1))

  eqtr3d(((dist ` c1)|`(c2 × c2)), ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0))), ((dist ` c0)|`(c2 × c2)), w0)
  reseq2d((dist ` c0), (c2 × c2), ((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)), w0)
  sqxpeqd(c2, (Base ` c0), w0)
  reseq2d((dist ` c1), (c2 × c2), ((Base ` c1)×(Base ` c1)), w0)

blocks.name: prdsbl
blocks.content: A ball in the product metric for finite index set is the Cartesian product of balls in all coordinates. For infinite index set this is no longer true; instead the correct statement is that a *closed ball* is the product of closed balls in each coordinate (where closed ball means a set of the form in ~ blcld ) - for a counterexample the point ` p ` in ` RR ^ NN ` whose ` n ` -th coordinate is ` 1 - 1 / n ` is in ` X_ n e. NN ball ( 0 , 1 ) ` but is not in the ` 1 ` -ball of the product (since ` d ( 0 , p ) = 1 ` ). The last assumption, ` 0 < A ` , is needed only in the case ` I = (/) ` , when the right side evaluates to ` { (/) } ` and the left evaluates to ` (/) ` if ` A <_ 0 ` and ` { (/) } ` if ` 0 < A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: blssopn
blocks.content: The balls of a metric space are open sets. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: unimopn
blocks.content: The union of a collection of open sets of a metric space is open. Theorem T2 of [Kreyszig] p. 19. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: mopnin
blocks.content: The intersection of two open sets of a metric space is open. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: mopn0
blocks.content: The empty set is an open set of a metric space. Part of Theorem T1 of [Kreyszig] p. 19. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: rnblopn
blocks.content: A ball of a metric space is an open set. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: blopn
blocks.content: A ball of a metric space is an open set. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: neibl
blocks.content: The neighborhoods around a point ` P ` of a metric space are those subsets containing a ball around ` P ` . Definition of neighborhood in [Kreyszig] p. 19. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: blnei
blocks.content: A ball around a point is a neighborhood of the point. (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: lpbl
blocks.content: Every ball around a limit point ` P ` of a subset ` S ` includes a member of ` S ` (even if ` P e/ S ` ). (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: blcld
blocks.content: A "closed ball" in a metric space is actually closed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: blcls
blocks.content: The closure of an open ball in a metric space is contained in the corresponding closed ball. (Equality need not hold; for example, with the discrete metric, the closed ball of radius 1 is the whole space, but the open ball of radius 1 is just a point, whose closure is also a point.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: blsscls
blocks.content: If two concentric balls have different radii, the closure of the smaller one is contained in the larger one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2014.)

} = {

  blsscls2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, crab(hs0, c1, wbr(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cle, c3)), c5)

blocks.name: metequiv
blocks.content: Two ways of saying that two metrics generate the same topology. Two metrics satisfying the right-hand side are said to be (topologically) equivalent. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jun-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: metss2
blocks.content: If the metric ` D ` is "strongly finer" than ` C ` (meaning that there is a positive real constant ` R ` such that ` C ( x , y ) <_ R x. D ( x , y ) ` ), then ` D ` generates a finer topology. (Using this theorem twice in each direction states that if two metrics are strongly equivalent, then they generate the same topology.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm metss2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

} = {
  mpbird(w0, wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c4, wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs0, crp, wss(co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c3), cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cbl, c2), cv(hs1)))))))

thm metss2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(MetOpen ` c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(MetOpen ` c3)

blocks.name: comet
blocks.content: The composition of an extended metric with a monotonic subadditive function is an extended metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: stdbdmetval
blocks.content: Value of the standard bounded metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm stdbdmetval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), cif(co(c2, c6, c4), c0, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0))))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cif(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), cle, c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  3comr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), cif(co(c2, c6, c4), c0, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0))))
  syl3an3(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, c5, c4), cif(co(c2, c6, c4), c0, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0))), wcel(cif(co(c2, c6, c4), c0, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0)), universe))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cif(co(c2, c6, c4), c0, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0)), universe), wcel(co(c2, c6, c4), universe))
  ovex(c2, c6, c4)
  ifexg(co(c2, c6, c4), universe, c0, c1, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0))
  ovmpt2ga(s0, s1, c2, c3, c4, c3, cif(co(c2, c6, c4), c0, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0)), universe, c5, cif(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), cle, c0)))
  ifbieq1d(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c0, co(c2, c6, c4), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c4)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), cle, c0), wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0))
  breq1d(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), cle, c0, co(c2, c6, c4), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c4)))
  oveq12(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1), c4, c6)
  diff.cif.s(s0, co(c2, c6, c4), c0, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c6, c4)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cif.s(s1, co(c2, c6, c4), c0, wbr(co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(c2, c6, c4), cle, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, c6, c4)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm stdbdmetval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c3)→(c2[c5]c4)= if((c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0,(c2[c6]c4), c0))
  ⊣ c5 =(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ if((s0[c6]s1)[≤]c0,(s0[c6]s1), c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
} = {
  3comr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c3, (c2[c5]c4)= if((c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0,(c2[c6]c4), c0))
  syl3an3(c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c1, (c2[c5]c4)= if((c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0,(c2[c6]c4), c0), if((c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0,(c2[c6]c4), c0)∈ 𝕌)
  mpan(c0 ∈ c1, if((c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0,(c2[c6]c4), c0)∈ 𝕌, (c2[c6]c4)∈ 𝕌)
  ovex(c2, c6, c4)
  ifexg((c2[c6]c4), universe, c0, c1, (c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0)
  ovmpt2ga(s0, s1, c2, c3, c4, c3, if((c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0,(c2[c6]c4), c0), universe, c5, if((s0[c6]s1)[≤]c0,(s0[c6]s1), c0))
  ifbieq1d((s0[c6]s1), c0, (c2[c6]c4), (s0 = c2 ∧ s1 = c4), (s0[c6]s1)[≤]c0, (c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0)
  breq1d((s0[c6]s1), cle, c0, (c2[c6]c4), (s0 = c2 ∧ s1 = c4))
  oveq12(s0, c2, s1, c4, c6)
  diff.cif.s(s0, (c2[c6]c4), c0, (c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, (c2[c6]c4), cle, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c6, c4)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cif.s(s1, (c2[c6]c4), c0, (c2[c6]c4)[≤]c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, (c2[c6]c4), cle, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, c6, c4)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: stdbdxmet
blocks.content: The standard bounded metric is an extended metric given an extended metric and a positive extended real cutoff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm stdbdxmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, cif(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c2, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cle, c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c3, cfv(cxmet, c1), ccom(cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cif(cv(hs0), c2, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))), c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)))

blocks.name: stdbdmet
blocks.content: The standard bounded metric is a proper metric given an extended metric and a positive real cutoff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm stdbdmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, crp)), wcel(c3, cfv(cmet, c1)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, crp)), wcel(c3, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wf(c3, cxp(c1, c1), cr))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, crp), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)))
  jca(wcel(c2, crp), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))
  rpgt0(c2)
  3expb(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  stdbdxmet(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)

blocks.name: mopnex
blocks.content: The topology generated by an extended metric can also be generated by a true metric. Thus, "metrizable topologies" can equivalently be defined in terms of metrics or extended metrics. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  1rp()
  stdbdmet(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, nat1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, cif(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, nat1))))
  mp3an23(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, cif(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, nat1))))), wcel(nat1, cxr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  1xr()
  0lt1()
  stdbdmopn(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, nat1, c2, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, cif(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, nat1))))

  fveq2(cv(s0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, cif(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), nat1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), cle, nat1))), cmopn)

blocks.name: met2ndci
blocks.content: A separable metric space (a metric space with a countable dense subset) is second-countable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: met2ndc
blocks.content: A metric space is second-countable iff it is separable (has a countable dense subset). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm met2ndc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c2ndc), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbid(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c2ndc), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1))))
  syl5ibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c2ndc), wrex(s0, cpw(c1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1))), wrex(s0, cpw(cuni(c2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), cuni(c2)))))
  2ndcsep(s0, c2, cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  rexeqbidv(s0, cpw(c1), cpw(cuni(c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), cuni(c2))))
  pweqd(c1, cuni(c2), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  anbi2d(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), cuni(c2)))
  eqeq2d(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1, cuni(c2), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  mopnuni(c0, c1, c2)
  rexlimdv(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c2, c2ndc))
  syl5(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c1)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(c2, c2ndc)), wss(cv(s0), c1))
  elpwi(cv(s0), c1)
  imp4a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(c2, c2ndc))
  3exp2(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(c2, c2ndc))
  met2ndci(c0, c1, cv(s0), c2)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cxmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cxmet, c1)
  diff.cxmet.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c2ndc)
  diff.c2ndc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm met2ndc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→(c2 ∈ 2ndc ↔ ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0[≼]_om ∧((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1))))
  ⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbid(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ∈ 2ndc, ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0[≼]_om ∧((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1)))
  syl5ibr(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ∈ 2ndc, ∃(s0 ∈ P(c1),(s0[≼]_om ∧((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ P(⋃ c2),(s0[≼]_om ∧((cls ` c2)` s0)= ⋃ c2)))
  2ndcsep(s0, c2, ⋃ c2)
  eqid(⋃ c2)
  rexeqbidv(s0, P(c1), P(⋃ c2), c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (s0[≼]_om ∧((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1), (s0[≼]_om ∧((cls ` c2)` s0)= ⋃ c2))
  pweqd(c1, ⋃ c2, c0 ∈(*Met ` c1))
  anbi2d(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), s0[≼]_om, ((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1, ((cls ` c2)` s0)= ⋃ c2)
  eqeq2d(((cls ` c2)` s0), c1, ⋃ c2, c0 ∈(*Met ` c1))
  mopnuni(c0, c1, c2)
  rexlimdv(s0, P(c1), c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), (s0[≼]_om ∧((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1), c2 ∈ 2ndc)
  syl5(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), s0 ∈ P(c1), ((s0[≼]_om ∧((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1)→ c2 ∈ 2ndc), s0 ⊆ c1)
  elpwi(s0, c1)
  imp4a(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), s0 ⊆ c1, s0[≼]_om, ((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1, c2 ∈ 2ndc)
  3exp2(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), s0 ⊆ c1, s0[≼]_om, ((cls ` c2)` s0)= c1, c2 ∈ 2ndc)
  met2ndci(c0, c1, s0, c2)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (*Met ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cxmet, c1)
  diff.cxmet.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c2ndc)
  diff.c2ndc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: metrest
blocks.content: Two alternate formulations of a subspace topology of a metric space topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 19-Aug-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm metrest(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(co(c3, crest, c2), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cres(c0, cxp(c2, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmopn, c5))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c3, crest, c2), c4, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)))
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, crest, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c5), cv(hs3)), cv(hs0))))))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c5), cv(hs3)), cv(hs0))))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cv(hs0))))))
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cv(hs0))))))
  rexlimdva(hs1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cv(hs0))))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c2), wral(hs2, cv(hs0), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cv(hs0))))), wa(wss(cin(cv(hs1), c2), c2), wral(hs2, cin(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cin(cv(hs1), c2))))))
  jctil(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wss(cin(cv(hs1), c2), c2), wral(hs2, cin(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wral(hs2, cin(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))), wral(hs2, cin(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)))))
  mpsyl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c3)), wral(hs2, cin(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)))), wss(cin(cv(hs1), c2), cv(hs1)), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)))))
  inss1(cv(hs1), c2)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)))))
  simplbda(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wral(hs2, cv(hs1), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)))), wss(cv(hs1), c1))
  elmopn2(hs2, hs3, c0, c1, cv(hs1), c3)
  ssralv(hs2, cin(cv(hs1), c2), cv(hs1), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1))))
  ralimi(hs2, cin(cv(hs1), c2), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs3, crp, wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cin(cv(hs1), c2))))
  reximi(hs3, crp, wss(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1)), wss(cin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), c2), cin(cv(hs1), c2)))
  ssrin(co(cv(hs2), cfv(cbl, c0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs1), c2)
  inss2(cv(hs1), c2)

  ⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(MetOpen ` c5)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c3[|`t]c2), c4, (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  3bitr4d((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c1), hs0 ∈(c3[|`t]c2), hs0 ∈ c4, ∃(hs1 ∈ c3, hs0 =(hs1 ⋂ c2)), (hs0 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0, ∃(hs3 ∈ ℝ+,(hs2[(ball ` c5)]hs3)⊆ hs0))))

blocks.name: ressxms
blocks.content: The restriction of a metric space is a metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: prdsxms
blocks.content: The indexed product structure is an extended metric space when the index set is finite. (Although the extended metric is still valid when the index set is infinite, it no longer agrees with the product topology, which is not metrizable in any case.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Aug-2015.)

thm prdsxms(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  prdsxmslem1((dist ` c4), (Base ` c4), c4, c0, c3, c1, c2, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ Fin ∧(c3 : c2 → *MetSp)))

blocks.name: prdsms
blocks.content: The indexed product structure is a metric space when the index set is finite. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prdsms(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(c3, c2, cms)), wcel(c4, cms))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cprds, c3))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(c3, c2, cms)), wcel(c4, cms), wcel(c4, cxms), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c4), cxp(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c4))))
  syl3an3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(c3, c2, cms), wcel(c4, cxms), wf(c3, c2, cxms))
  mpan2(wf(c3, c2, cms), wf(c3, c2, cxms), wss(cms, cxms))
  ssriv(hs0, cms, cxms)
  msxms(cv(hs0))
  fss(c3, c2, cms, cxms)
  prdsxms(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(c3, c2, cms)), wcel(cres(cfv(cds, c4), cxp(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c4))), wcel(cfv(cds, c4), cfv(cmet, cfv(cbs, c4))), wss(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  prdsmslem1(cfv(cds, c4), cfv(cbs, c4), c4, c0, c3, c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(c3, c2, cms)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(c3, c2, cms))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(c3, c2, cms))
  eqid(cfv(cds, c4))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(c3, c2, cms))
  ssid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  metres2(cfv(cds, c4), cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))
  isms(c4, cres(cfv(cds, c4), cxp(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))), cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(ctopn, c4))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  eqid(cres(cfv(cds, c4), cxp(cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(cms)
  diff.hs0.c(cxms)
}

blocks.name: pwsxms
blocks.content: The product of a finite family of metric spaces is a metric space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwsxms(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(c2, cxms))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cpws, c1))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c2, cxms, co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cfn)))
  pwsval(c0, cxms, c1, cfn, c2, cfv(csca, c0))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))), cxms), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), universe), wcel(c1, cfn), wf(cxp(c1, csn(c0)), c1, cxms))
  fvexd(csca, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cfn)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cfn))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cfn), wf(cxp(c1, csn(c0)), c1, cxms))
  fconst6g(c0, cxms, c1)
  prdsxms(cfv(csca, c0), universe, c1, cxp(c1, csn(c0)), co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))))
  eqid(co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, cxp(c1, csn(c0))))
}

thm xpsxms(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)), wcel(c2, cxms))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cxps, c1))
} = {
  imasf1oxms(c2, ccnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)))), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)))
  xpsval(hs0, hs1, c2, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)))), c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), cxms, cxms, cfv(csca, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)))
  xpslem(hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)))), c2, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), cxms, cxms, cfv(csca, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c0))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)), wf1o(ccnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))), wf1o(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))))))
  xpsff1o2(hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))))
  f1ocnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)), wcel(co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)))), cxms), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), universe), wcel(c2o, cfn), wf(ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1))), c2o, cxms))
  fvexd(csca, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)), wcel(c2o, cfn), wcel(c2o, com))
  2onn()
  nnfi(c2o)
  biimpri(wa(wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c1, cxms)), wf(ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1))), c2o, cxms))
  xpscf(c0, c1, cxms)
  prdsxms(cfv(csca, c0), universe, c2o, ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1))), co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)))))
  eqid(co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cxms)

  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))

thm xpsxms(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp)→ c2 ∈ *MetSp)
  ⊣ c2 =(c0[×]c1)
} = {
  imasf1oxms(c2, `'(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), ((Scalar ` c0)[×]`'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 })), ran((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 }))), ((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c1)), (c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp))
  xpsval(hs0, hs1, c2, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), ((Scalar ` c0)[×]`'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 })), c0, c1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), cxms, cxms, (Scalar ` c0), (c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp))
  xpslem(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), ((Scalar ` c0)[×]`'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 })), c2, c0, c1, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), cxms, cxms, (Scalar ` c0), (c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  simpl(c0 ∈ *MetSp, c1 ∈ *MetSp)
  simpr(c0 ∈ *MetSp, c1 ∈ *MetSp)
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  mp1i((c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp), (`'(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })): ran((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })))↔((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c1))), ((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })):((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c1))↔ ran((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })))))
  xpsff1o2(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1))
  eqid((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })))
  f1ocnv((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), ((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c1)), ran((hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1)↦ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 }))))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp), ((Scalar ` c0)[×]`'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 }))∈ *MetSp, (Scalar ` c0)∈ 𝕌, 2o ∈ Fin, (`'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 }): 2o → *MetSp))
  fvexd(csca, c0, (c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp))
  mp1i((c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp), 2o ∈ Fin, 2o ∈ _om)
  2onn()
  nnfi(c2o)
  biimpri((c0 ∈ *MetSp ∧ c1 ∈ *MetSp), (`'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 }): 2o → *MetSp))
  xpscf(c0, c1, cxms)
  prdsxms((Scalar ` c0), universe, c2o, `'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 }), ((Scalar ` c0)[×]`'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 })))
  eqid(((Scalar ` c0)[×]`'({ c0 }[+]{ c1 })))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cxms)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c1))
}

blocks.name: tmsxps
blocks.content: Express the product of two metrics as another metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tmsxps(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, cxp(c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cds, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c0, cfv(cxmet, cxp(c1, c2)), cfv(cxmet, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)))), w0)
  eqeltrrd(c0, cfv(cxmet, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)))), cres(c0, cxp(cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cres(c0, cxp(cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))))), c0), wfn(c0, cxp(cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))))))
  xpsdsfn2(c0, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)), cfv(ctms, c3), cfv(ctms, c4), cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c3)), cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c4)), cxms, cxms, w0)
  fnresdm(c0, cxp(cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)))))
  syl(w0, wcel(cres(c0, cxp(cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))))), cfv(cxmet, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))))), wcel(co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)), cxms))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)), cxms), wcel(cfv(ctms, c3), cxms), wcel(cfv(ctms, c4), cxms))
  xpsxms(cfv(ctms, c3), cfv(ctms, c4), co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)))
  xmsxmet2(co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)), c0, cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))))
  fveq2d(cxmet, cxp(c1, c2), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))), w0)
  eqtrd(cxp(c1, c2), cfv(cbs, co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4))), cxp(cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c3)), cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c4))), w0)
  xpeq12d(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c3)), cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c4)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c3))), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  tmsbas(c3, c1, cfv(ctms, c3))
  syl(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c4))), wcel(c4, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
  tmsbas(c4, c2, cfv(ctms, c4))
  xpsbas(cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c3)), cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c4)), co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)), cfv(ctms, c3), cfv(ctms, c4), cxms, cxms, w0)
  eqid(co(cfv(ctms, c3), cxps, cfv(ctms, c4)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c3)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c4)))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(ctms, c3), cxms), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  tmsxms(c3, c1, cfv(ctms, c3))
  eqid(cfv(ctms, c3))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(ctms, c4), cxms), wcel(c4, cfv(cxmet, c2)))
  tmsxms(c4, c2, cfv(ctms, c4))
  eqid(cfv(ctms, c4))
}

  fveq2d(cmopn, (c3 |`((Base `((toMetSp ` c4)[×](toMetSp ` c5)))×(Base `((toMetSp ` c4)[×](toMetSp ` c5))))), c3, w0)

  syl(w0, wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, cfv(ctms, c6))), wcel(c6, cfv(cxmet, c8)))

  oveqd(c1, c6, c4, cfv(cds, cfv(ctms, c6)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c6, cfv(cds, cfv(ctms, c6))), wcel(c6, cfv(cxmet, c8)))
  tmsds(c6, c8, cfv(ctms, c6))
  eqid(cfv(ctms, c6))
}

thm tmsxpsval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(< c0, c1 >[c2]< c3, c4 >)= sup({(c0[c5]c3),(c1[c6]c4)}, ℝ*, <))
  ⊣ c2 =(dist `((toMetSp ` c5)[×](toMetSp ` c6)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈(*Met ` c7))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈(*Met ` c8))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c8)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c8)
} = {
  eqtrd((< c0, c1 >[c2]< c3, c4 >), sup({(c0[c5]c3),(c1[c6]c4)}, ℝ*, <), sup({(c0[((dist `(toMetSp ` c5))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c5))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c5))))]c3),(c1[((dist `(toMetSp ` c6))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c6))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c6))))]c4)}, ℝ*, <), w0)
  xpsdsval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, ((dist `(toMetSp ` c5))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c5))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c5)))), ((dist `(toMetSp ` c6))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c6))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c6)))), ((toMetSp ` c5)[×](toMetSp ` c6)), (toMetSp ` c5), (toMetSp ` c6), (Base `(toMetSp ` c5)), (Base `(toMetSp ` c6)), cxms, cxms, w0)
  eqid(((toMetSp ` c5)[×](toMetSp ` c6)))
  eqid((Base `(toMetSp ` c5)))
  eqid((Base `(toMetSp ` c6)))
  syl(w0, (toMetSp ` c5)∈ *MetSp, c5 ∈(*Met ` c7))
  tmsxms(c5, c7, (toMetSp ` c5))
  syl(w0, (toMetSp ` c6)∈ *MetSp, c6 ∈(*Met ` c8))
  tmsxms(c6, c8, (toMetSp ` c6))
  eqid(((dist `(toMetSp ` c5))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c5))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c5)))))
  eqid(((dist `(toMetSp ` c6))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c6))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c6)))))
  sylancl(w0, ((dist `(toMetSp ` c5))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c5))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c5))))∈(*Met `(Base `(toMetSp ` c5))), (dist `(toMetSp ` c5))∈(*Met `(Base `(toMetSp ` c5))), (Base `(toMetSp ` c5))⊆(Base `(toMetSp ` c5)))
  3eltr3d((dist `(toMetSp ` c5)), (*Met `(Base `(toMetSp ` c5))), c5, (*Met ` c7), w0)
  fveq2d(cxmet, c7, (Base `(toMetSp ` c5)), w0)
  ssid((Base `(toMetSp ` c5)))
  xmetres2((dist `(toMetSp ` c5)), (Base `(toMetSp ` c5)), (Base `(toMetSp ` c5)))
  sylancl(w0, ((dist `(toMetSp ` c6))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c6))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c6))))∈(*Met `(Base `(toMetSp ` c6))), (dist `(toMetSp ` c6))∈(*Met `(Base `(toMetSp ` c6))), (Base `(toMetSp ` c6))⊆(Base `(toMetSp ` c6)))
  3eltr3d((dist `(toMetSp ` c6)), (*Met `(Base `(toMetSp ` c6))), c6, (*Met ` c8), w0)
  fveq2d(cxmet, c8, (Base `(toMetSp ` c6)), w0)
  ssid((Base `(toMetSp ` c6)))
  xmetres2((dist `(toMetSp ` c6)), (Base `(toMetSp ` c6)), (Base `(toMetSp ` c6)))
  supeq1d({(c0[((dist `(toMetSp ` c5))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c5))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c5))))]c3),(c1[((dist `(toMetSp ` c6))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c6))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c6))))]c4)}, cxr, clt, {(c0[c5]c3),(c1[c6]c4)}, w0)
  preq12d((c0[((dist `(toMetSp ` c5))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c5))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c5))))]c3), (c1[((dist `(toMetSp ` c6))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c6))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c6))))]c4), (c0[c5]c3), (c1[c6]c4), w0)
  eqtr4d((c0[((dist `(toMetSp ` c5))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c5))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c5))))]c3), (c0[c5]c3), (c0[(dist `(toMetSp ` c5))]c3), w0)
  ovresd(c0, (dist `(toMetSp ` c5)), (Base `(toMetSp ` c5)), c3, w0)
  eleqtrd(c0, (Base `(toMetSp ` c5)), c7, w0)
  eleqtrd(c3, (Base `(toMetSp ` c5)), c7, w0)
  syl(w0, c7 =(Base `(toMetSp ` c5)), c5 ∈(*Met ` c7))
  tmsbas(c5, c7, (toMetSp ` c5))
  oveqd(c0, c5, c3, (dist `(toMetSp ` c5)), w0)
  syl(w0, c5 =(dist `(toMetSp ` c5)), c5 ∈(*Met ` c7))
  tmsds(c5, c7, (toMetSp ` c5))
  eqid((toMetSp ` c5))
  eqtr4d((c1[((dist `(toMetSp ` c6))|`((Base `(toMetSp ` c6))×(Base `(toMetSp ` c6))))]c4), (c1[c6]c4), (c1[(dist `(toMetSp ` c6))]c4), w0)
  ovresd(c1, (dist `(toMetSp ` c6)), (Base `(toMetSp ` c6)), c4, w0)

  syl(w0, c6 =(dist `(toMetSp ` c6)), c6 ∈(*Met ` c8))

  eqid((toMetSp ` c6))
}

thm tmsxpsval2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cop(c0, c1), c2, cop(c3, c4)), cif(co(c1, c6, c4), co(c0, c5, c3), wbr(co(c0, c5, c3), cle, co(c1, c6, c4)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, co(cfv(ctms, c5), cxps, cfv(ctms, c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(cxmet, c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(cxmet, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c8))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(cop(c0, c1), c2, cop(c3, c4)), cif(co(c1, c6, c4), co(c0, c5, c3), wbr(co(c0, c5, c3), cle, co(c1, c6, c4))), csup(cpr(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4)), cxr, clt), cif(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4), wbr(co(c1, c6, c4), clt, co(c0, c5, c3))), w0)
  tmsxpsval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, w0)
  mp3an2i(w0, wceq(csup(cpr(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4)), cxr, clt), cif(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4), wbr(co(c1, c6, c4), clt, co(c0, c5, c3)))), wor(clt, cxr), wcel(co(c0, c5, c3), cxr), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), cxr))
  xrltso()
  suppr(clt, cxr, co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4))
  syl6eq(cif(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4), wbr(co(c1, c6, c4), clt, co(c0, c5, c3))), cif(co(c1, c6, c4), co(c0, c5, c3), wbr(co(c0, c5, c3), cle, co(c1, c6, c4))), cif(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4), wn(wbr(co(c0, c5, c3), cle, co(c1, c6, c4)))), w0)
  ifbid(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4), w0, wbr(co(c1, c6, c4), clt, co(c0, c5, c3)), wn(wbr(co(c0, c5, c3), cle, co(c1, c6, c4))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(co(c1, c6, c4), clt, co(c0, c5, c3)), wn(wbr(co(c0, c5, c3), cle, co(c1, c6, c4)))), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), cxr), wcel(co(c0, c5, c3), cxr))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), cxr), wcel(c6, cfv(cxmet, c8)), wcel(c1, c8), wcel(c4, c8))
  xmetcl(c6, c8, c1, c4)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, c5, c3), cxr), wcel(c5, cfv(cxmet, c7)), wcel(c0, c7), wcel(c3, c7))
  xmetcl(c5, c7, c0, c3)
  xrltnle(co(c1, c6, c4), co(c0, c5, c3))
  ifnot(co(c0, c5, c3), co(c1, c6, c4), wbr(co(c0, c5, c3), cle, co(c1, c6, c4)))
}
